title: Khaki Grey Ulter Soft Duvet Cover Set - Solid Color Reversible Soft Microfiber Quilt Covers Home Collection - Down Comforter Cover and Pillow Protectors  (Khaki Grey, Twin Size (66×90 inch))
features: Quality Material: Designed for people who require simple but ultra comfortable and healthy bed linen. This trendy duvet cover set made by high quality brushed microfiber, soft like cotton feel, breathable and cozy, comfortable and durable,fade and stain resistant. Suitable for all seasons.

Chic Reversible Solid-Colored Design: Reversible style enables you change the color of the front and back of the duvet cover by mood. A color, a mood. If you get tired of the mauve side, flip it over. Our duvet cover set can also be a great bedroom decoration or gift for your family and friends.

Twin Size: 2-piece set includes one duvet cover and one pillow shams. Twin size duvet cover measures 66” x 90” inches and includes zipper closure. Twin size pillow shams measure 20” x 36” inches. Also available in Queen size and King sizes. ★Please Note: Our sets does not include quilt/comforter inside. Bedding sheet is also not included.

Machine Washable: Microfiber duvet covers are easy to care for and quick drying in the washing machine - microfiber is naturally shrink, fading and wrinkle resistant. Simply machine wash cold, tumble dry, no bleach
Satisfaction Service: We strive to provide the best customer service. If you have any questions,please feel free to contact us, our customer service staff will reply you within 24 hours.
description: MATERIAL: 100% High Quality Brushed Microfiber Polyester Made from 100% microfiber polyester, this duvet cover set offers long-lasting strength, a natural resistance to shrinking, fading and wrinkles, and a noticeably soft hand feel. Lightweight, breathable, our luxuriously soft bedding will create a serene sleeping experience, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.  SIZES AND COLORS: Choose from our selection of vibrant, beautiful colors to find the perfect shade that will update your bedroom and give it a fresh, new look. Upgrading your bedroom décor has never been so easy and affordable! QUEEN 3 PIECE SET: Duvet cover measures 90” x 90”, pillow shams measure 20” x 26” KING 3 PIECE SET: Duvet cover measures 104” x 90”, pillow shams measure 20” x 36” TWIN 2 PIECE SET: Duvet cover measures 66” x 90”, pillow sham measure 20” x 26”  MAINTENANCE METHOD: Wash, dry, iron, fold and store; Keep away from acid and alkali substances when storing; Please store in a dry and cool place to avoid damp and mildew; When ironing, the maximum temperature of the iron shall not exceed 110 ℃.
